TextBody:
Hello Kevin,

Thank you for reaching out.


One of my colleagues from the correspondent time zone will get back to you as soon as possible.


In case there will be a need for a remote session, can you please let us know your time zone and availability for tomorrow ?


Thank you !

Best regards,
__________________
Daniel Anton | Technical Support Engineer

DLP | MDM | Device Control | Content Aware Protection

TextBody:
Hi Kevin,

From what I can tell you applied the vulnerability patch right before the logs stopped showing up. As per the last notice from Netwrix, we are working on a fix for this issue.
As soon the patch will be made available you can apply it to restore normal functionality
Let me know if you have further questions.

Thank you,
Eduard Nut
Technical Support Engineer

Endpoint Protector now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection
eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
CoSoSys Ltd
www.endpointprotector.com

TextBody:
Hi Kevin,

Unfortunately, I do not have a release date right now, but it should not take a long time since engineering is working hard on it.
I cannot even provide a workaround since the logs would not show up at all until we apply the fix.
What would be a use case of a user that needs your help in this situation so I can think about a workaround until then?

Thank you,
Eduard Nut
Technical Support Engineer

ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000CcgiW:ref

Well, today we had a user get blocked for something that was suspected to be an SSN.  I wasn't able to use the logs to see what really happened.  But in this case I was able to figure out what happened.

I think we are fine for now.
